attributes.action: Ensure that he uses adequate jaw control during public speeches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown's an embarrassment when it comes to public speeches. He lacks any jaw control and many people find it difficult to listen to him without concentrating purely on his strange jaw movements between sentences.People will not take him seriously. Leaders of rogue nations will simply not listen too him.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
